author: Willy
content: How hard is it to make a lift work? It is a design that went back to WWII.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: They are really just an arrogance. The source of many needless human casualties.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: The bigger the ship the bigger the target!

author: Willy
content: No arresting wire, no catapult. A big improvement. As long as they are easier to fly and maintain over the harrier, America will finally have done something right.
